description.para: Run the edge detector over the block and return a list of blobs.
Gather together outlines into blobs using the usual bucket sort.
Run the edge detector over the block and return a list of blobs.
Run the edge detector over the block and return a list of blobs.
Find all neighbouring outlines that are children of this outline and either move them to the output list or declare this outline illegal and return FALSE.

memberdef.argsstring: (edges_use_new_outline_complexity, FALSE,"Use the new outline complexity module")
memberdef.name: BOOL_VAR

memberdef.argsstring: (edges_max_children_per_outline, 10,"Max number of children inside a character outline")
memberdef.name: INT_VAR

param.type: "Max number of children inside a character outline"

memberdef.argsstring: (edges_max_children_layers, 5,"Max layers of nested children inside a character outline")
memberdef.name: INT_VAR

param.type: "Max layers of nested children inside a character outline"

memberdef.argsstring: (edges_debug, FALSE,"turn on debugging for this module")
memberdef.name: BOOL_VAR

memberdef.argsstring: (edges_children_fix, FALSE,"Remove boxy parents of char-like children")
memberdef.name: BOOL_VAR

memberdef.argsstring: (edges_min_nonhole, 12,"Min pixels for potential char in box")
memberdef.name: INT_VAR

param.type: "Min pixels for potential char in box"

memberdef.argsstring: (edges_boxarea, 0.875,"Min area fraction of grandchild for box")
memberdef.name: double_VAR

param.type: "Min area fraction of grandchild for box"
